ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re-inrto
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember you.  Welcome back! the newest expansion is Omens of War, and spend 3 AA points and yo can get a 9th spell slot.  To me, it s the greatest thing
ygData.messageBody:
I remember you.  Welcome back!
 
the newest expansion is Omens of War, and spend 3 AA points and yo can get a 9th spell slot.  To me, it's the greatest thing abotu the expansion.  I tell ya, that slot comes in so handy, and it's somethign I requested they add back when Kunark came out.
 
currently, my druid on Cazic Thule (my main) is up to level 64 and AA grinding.  I already have the title of Baron, and halfway through the points I need for Venerable, but I'm having to do back buying of AA skills so I can get ready for some of the Advanced skills.  by that I mean I want to get Advanced Innate wisdom, but to do that I need Innate Wisdom maxed.  So I'm spending points ont he general skills instead of saving up for the ones I want.  But at 64, AA points come pretty quick.  I can usually do 2 in about 3 hours, so it's not so bad.
 
Raido Covenfall
64 ELF DRU
Cazic Thule Server
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: STG2(SW) Pierce
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Monday, September 20, 2004 6:47 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re-inrto

Hello fellow EQ addicts!  For the few who might of known me..well I am back.
For those who don't remember here is a little story on how I got into this
group.  Last year I was in the gulf for 9 months with no EQ (only thing that
kept me sane was my collection of EQ guides) and I managed to have a buddy
of mine register this email address with Yahoo Groups..so while I was at sea
I could still keep up with the latest EQ news.  When I came back mid Nov. I
was amazed at all the changes the game has been thru (before I left I just
had downloaded LoY) now I'm upto date with all the expansions.  So anyway
here is a little info about me:

I have been playing EQ now since June of 02 (a buddy of mine got me started)
and have been addicted ever since.  I spent the majority of my time making
all kinds of characters, deleting them, making more, deleting
those..etc.,just to see how each class is like.  Well I have finally managed
to stick with a class I like which is my main 53 DE SK..3 more AAs and I get
a title heh.  I play on the Ayonae Ro server (with a couple old alts on
Tunare) and I am a member of the Caelitus guild and have been for about 5
1/2 months now.  Here is a list of all my..mains.

Ayonae Ro Server
Bloodbrood Deathdisciple 53 dark elf sk
Shruiken Tranquilfist 35 human monk
Raptersaur Reptilianclaw 30 iksar bst
Bloodlich 25 dark elf necro
Cleptocat Thiefofthenight 24 vah shir rogue
Steelbow 12 wood elf ranger
Hackx 10 vah shir zerker
Cruifixx 7 froglock pally
Speakerbox 6 half-elf bard

Tunare Server
Dabruiser 35 troll war
Xatrok Hellraiser 26 iksar necro (retired)
Shrubwacker 5 human druid (still has KEI back when anyone could get it)
Misticmind 5 eurodite wizzy (also with KEI)

Well I better end this before it gets too long, later all and Happy Hunting!




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
